name: Dead Memories
description:
What happens when we die? Who knows? But what happens when you wonder how you died? Play as Chrissa, a woman who died but suspects she was killed by someone. Explore her memories to find out who did it and help her move on to the afterlife. 

Credits:

Background Art: Kayden Bush (Instagram @kbushartworks)

Character Art: Liza Litten 

Godot Dialogic: coppolaemillio

NPC Interactions: Emi on YouTube
